page.title: 17RELIGION - STRANRAER
page.content: There are nine places of worship in our area.{4}of these are{Church of {Scotland}and there is{1 Chapel. { }There are no places of worship for ethnic minorities in Stranraer. The nearest mosque is in Glasgow. Smaller congregations such as Baptists and Jehovah Witnesses hold their meetings in small halls. A list of the larger places of worship in Stranraer would be:- { Church of Scotland- St. Ninian's - Rev. T. Mc Gill. St. Andrew's - Rev. T. O' Leary. High Kirk - Rev. A. Burgess. Old Parish - Rev. G.L. Thomson. { Roman Catholic- St. Joseph's - Rev. T. Leverage. { Others- Scottish Episcopalian - Rev E Kerrin. Reformed Presbyterian - Rev Milligan. Lewis St. Gospel Hall.
